name: SOKOBAD
description:
Old classic Sokoban, with original Think Rabbit 50 levels.(I did not make the levels !!)

Press arrows to move.

Shift key can reverse your steps.

Press D to see potential"Deadlocks"...(still in alpha version)

Press R to restart.

Press Escape to change level or exit !

Thanks for playing !____

May be done someday :

Solver ? (the ultimate goal)
